attributes.action: allow free school dinners and social fund loans be accessed by low earning working families also
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: many low earining families in the uk struggle to make ends meat with no help given with school dinners and no access to emergency social loans from the goverment . but if you dont work at all you can get everything free. its time that these loans and free school dinners and uniform grants were mean tested and given to people who need them regardless work statues
